QuestData.Title: One Last Breath
QuestData.Description: <The parchment is soaked in seawater. A note is hastily scribbled on it.>$B$BTo whomever finds this note first,$B$BBefore I was cast from Suramar, I was a master alchemist. In my time, I have concocted many potions and elixirs for the benefit of the Nightborne.$B$BAll of this was forgotten when the Legion came.$B$BBefore I succumb to the hunger, I wanted to create one last draught to celebrate my love of sea.$B$BDrink it and explore the vast deep in my honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drink the Nightfallen Alchemist's Strange Draught in Azuregale Bay.
